message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a budget of $80. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down?
I understand that you're on a budget, Bob, but I have to make a profit. I can do $100, which is a bit lower than my initial offer, but still a good deal for both of us.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. However, I'm still aiming to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to bring the price down to $90?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can do $110, which is a compromise between our previous offers.
I'm glad we're making progress, Alice. I'm still committed to staying within my budget. Could you consider bringing the price down to $100? I believe this would be a fair compromise.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $105, which is a bit higher than your last offer, but still a good compromise for both of us.

Thank you for your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm very close to my budget limit. Could you please consider lowering the price to $100? This would allow me to purchase the product without exceeding my financial constraints.

I've already offered you a price of $105 in the last round, Bob. I'm not willing to go lower than that. If you're really interested in the product, I think $105 is a fair price. If not, I'll have to consider other options.
